message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $130. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, considering its value to you is $100. Let me know if this offer works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $130 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I am willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $115. This allows you to purchase the item without exceeding your comfort level while still providing a fair return for the product. Please let me know if this revised offer suits you.
